about_the_game:
This DLC pack contains:

Free add-on: Twilight Skin Set. Just add it to library/
Thank you for your support as we design the best economic action survival shooter for you. AWL team.

name: Anarchy: Wolf's law : Prologue - Twilight Skin Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX or AMD Radeon 570 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This content requires the base game on Steam in order to play
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian*, Turkish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
